Articles.Content: i update ksp 1.2.1 to 1.2.2 after update i am facing a problem in career mode neither i can make maneuver nodes nor i can select any object such as mun minmus etc in map view, my active vessel orbit is in grey color instead of yellow, but every thing is fine in sandbox any one know how to fix it, i install all mode through ckan

In career mode you have to upgrade buildings to unlock the ability to make maneuver nodes as well as other things. You can do this by right clicking on a building and then pressing the upgrade button.

if I remember correctly you have to upgrade the mission control building to be able to make the maneuver nodes.

Yep, this is how it's supposed to work.

And so, moved to Gameplay Questions.
(It's actually both Mission Control and the Tracking Station that you need to upgrade, and it costs money.)

yup, mission control enables manuever nodes, the tracking statiom turns your orbit line blue and shows encounters etc

they both need to be upgraded just once for them
You should upgrade mission control or tracking station
